page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
A LARGE NUMBER OF THE POPULATION IS EMPLOYED BY THE FARMING COMMUNITY IN THE BLOCK, JOBS RANGING FROM FARM MANAGEMENT AND TRACTOR DRIVING TO PEAR AND CABBAGE HARVESTING.
A NUMBER BELONG TO THE ROYAL AIR FORCE BASES IN THE AREA.
A MUSHROOM FARM AT FRANSHAM EMPLOYS A NUMBER OF WOMEN DAILY FOR HARVESTING THE MUSHROOMS AND NORFOLK FARM PRODUCE COMPANY HAVE A CANNING FACTORY AT BEESTON WHICH EMPLOYS LOCAL PEOPLE IN THE CLEANING AND CANNING PROCESS.
THERE IS SOME UNEMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA BUT MANY PEOPLE TRAVEL TO OTHER TOWNS AND CITIES TO CARRY OUT THEIR WORK WHICH COVERS A VERY WIDE VARIETY OF JOBS.
